ygData.subject: Re: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Allakhazam s site seems to have reposted Gnomad s info, but it still looks a bit sketchy. According to that, the recipe is: Aqualung - 1 fine coral mesh, 1
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, Dec 16, 1999 at 11:35:02AM -0800, Gazamel Prime wrote:
> From: Gazamel Prime <gazamel@...>
>
> I have it at home, but I'm at work now =(. I think I
> saw someone with it up on a new website. The address
> was posted to this list, so check the archives...
>
Allakhazam's site seems to have reposted Gnomad's info, but it still looks a
bit sketchy.

According to that, the recipe is:
Aqualung - 1 fine coral mesh, 1 Silk Lined Steel Helm, 1 metal twine, 1
Gnomish bolts, 1 metal rod, 1 fresh fish

Joe D
